title: Bert+Score Layer+Kfold+WeightDecay(0.486)
description: The basic idea is from my kernel (https://www.kaggle.com/chanhu/bert-score-layer-lb-0-475). In this kernel, I had changed several points below.  keras -> pytorch(this is my second kernel wrote in pytorch) use pretrain Bert, EndpointSpanExtractor, and weight decay. (similar to Lee's work https://www.kaggle.com/ceshine/pytorch-bert-endpointspanextractor-kfold)  use kfold to get a robust score.(according to the comment from Matei Ionita, and huiqin. Thanks!)  P.S: the best I can get is 0.486.
description_lemmatized: basic idea kernel httpswwwkagglecomchanhubertscorelayerlb0475 kernel changed several point kera pytorchthis second kernel wrote pytorch use pretrain bert endpointspanextractor weight decay similar lee work httpswwwkagglecomceshinepytorchbertendpointspanextractorkfold use kfold get robust scoreaccording comment matei ionita huiqin thanks p best get 0486
